install.name: System - RokBox
install.author: RocketTheme
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 RocketTheme, LLC. All rights reserved.

param.name: theme
param.label: Preset Themes
param.description: Choose from Presets Themes. None of following options take effect when selected theme is different than 'custom'

param.name: custom-theme
param.label: Custom Theme
param.description: Theme name must not contain spaces. It refers to theme folder name

param.name: custom-legacy
param.label: Use Legacy Parameters
param.description: If enabled RokBox will load themes configuration. If themes configuration don't exist or it is disabled, you can customize RokBox from 'Legacy Parameters' below

param.name: transition
param.label: Transition of RokBox Effect
param.description: any of the available MooTools transitions.

param.name: duration
param.label: Duration of RokBox Effect
param.description: Duration in Milliseconds of the effect

param.name: chase
param.label: Chase
param.description: The Chase in px for Growl Effect

param.name: effect
param.label: Type of Animation
param.description: Type of Effect for appearing and disappearing of RokBox

param.name: frame-border
param.label: Borders width
param.description: Borders width in pixel to take into account

param.name: content-padding
param.label: Content Padding
param.description: Padding in pixel to take into account

param.name: arrows-height
param.label: Arrows Height
param.description: Height of arrows in pixel to take into account

param.name: captions
param.label: Show Captions
param.description: Enable or disable Captions

param.name: captionsDelay
param.label: Captions Delay
param.description: If above Captions are enabled, it will shows after the specified milliseconds

param.name: scrolling
param.label: Follow when Scrolling
param.description: RokBox moves to the center of window when scrolling

param.name: keyEvents
param.label: Enable Keys
param.description: Enable or disable Keys (esc, right, left) to interact via keyboard

param.name: overlay_background
param.label: Overlay Background
param.description: Background color for the Overlay

param.name: overlay_opacity
param.label: Overlay Opacity
param.description: Opacity for the Overlay, goes from 0.1 to 1

param.name: overlay_duration
param.label: Overlay Duration
param.description: Duration for Overlay opening and closing effect

param.name: overlay_transition
param.label: Transition of Overlay Effect
param.description: any of the available MooTools transitions.

param.name: autoplay
param.label: AutoPlay
param.description: Auto play movies when supported

param.name: ytautoplay
param.label: YouTube AutoPlay
param.description: Starts playing YouTube movies

param.name: ythighquality
param.label: YouTube High Quality (HD)
param.description: Enables YouTube HD Quality

param.name: controller
param.label: Controller
param.description: Show or hide controllers when supported

param.name: bgcolor
param.label: Background Color
param.description: Set background color of movies types that support it (ie, quicktime)

param.name: vimeoColor
param.label: Vimeo Color
param.description: Set Vimeo Color. Hex color does not have to start with hash (#)

param.name: vimeoPortrait
param.label: Vimeo Portrait
param.description: Show or hide Vimeo Portrait

param.name: vimeoTitle
param.label: Vimeo Title
param.description: Show or hide Vimeo Title

param.name: vimeoFullScreen
param.label: Vimeo Fullscreen
param.description: Show or hide Vimeo Fullscreen button

param.name: vimeoByline
param.label: Vimeo Byline
param.description: Show or hide Vimeo Author line
